channel.title: Npc talking above head (please delete old topic.)
channel.description:
Well i think you have to add a case
[code]case 355: sM("USE THIS PORTAL TO GO TO THE NEW PK PLACE."); break;[/code]
But how do you make the text say above his head? Im looking now for like dialogue and other npcs that have text above there head.
Please help.

item.title: Npc talking above head (please delete old topic.)

item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Well i think you have to add a case

case 355: sM("USE THIS PORTAL TO GO TO THE NEW PK PLACE."); break;

But how do you make the text say above his head? Im looking now for like dialogue and other npcs that have text above there head.

Please help.
